Aries.Characteristics: These people are cheerful, provocative, sometimes irritable and extremely stubborn. If they are planning something to do and their plans are destroyed, then their anger will be felt by anyone who starts to soothe them or blame it. Therefore, the desire to do as they wish, they can sometimes turn into despotism. Aries are dodgy and intelligent, which is why they devote most of their time to the cause of their whole life.
Aries.Prediction: In the beginning and middle of May Aries can face serious opposition to their initiatives. Despite your desire to realize your plans, you can fail. The fact that you can resist influential people, endowed with power with which you will not be easy to compete. This is especially true for career and professional activities. Another problem of these days may be associated with unnecessarily high financial costs. Perhaps, the circumstances will develop in such a way that you will be forced to pay bills urgently. As a result, the financial balance of your budget may be violated. At the end of May, in the 20th days, there will be favorable days for spiritual practices. It is good to attend closed groups of seminars, where classes are held on developing extrasensory abilities and studying the hidden potentialities of the psyche. Successfully undergo meditation sessions.

Taurus.Характеристика: The most industrious and patient sign, goes slowly, but it is true, knowing that only in this way something can be achieved. Proceeding from their stubbornness, one can confidently say that they do not listen to advice, and if they listen, they make up their own plan in their heads. Taurus madly jealous, sometimes their jealousy can reach the extreme point, it only inflates the flame of love in the soul of the conservative Taurus.
Taurus.Prediction: Taurus in the beginning and middle of May can feel, as if external circumstances or unknown people try to limit their activity. It may be data previously committed to someone who, in the current circumstances, will become burdensome to you. Do not try to look for workarounds, achieving the set goals against existing laws and regulations. In this case, you may have trouble. Stay away from the authorities. In the event of a large delay in the payment of debts, your accounts can be blocked. Do not exclude attempts of secret detractors to damage your reputation. The middle of the month can be associated with disagreements with a partner. If you have to carry out an important business together with a partner, in which you are personally interested, then try not to criticize your partner and touch his self-esteem. Cooperation with a partner is possible only with mutual respect. At the end of the month you can be invited to a celebration such as a wedding or an anniversary. Successful parties are friendly. Wait for pleasant surprises and fulfillment of cherished desires.

Gemini.Characteristics: The most inconsistent sign of the Zodiac, but their mind is quirky, so the Twins are smart and talented. They are flirtatious, flirting for them, like a sip of water in the heat, but the home, deceased life, alas, does not suit all Gemini. These natures do not accept conservatism and want diversity.
Gemini.Prediction: In the beginning and middle of May, Gemini may have an extremely unstable situation. There can be force majeure situations when you have to urgently adjust your plans and deal with completely different things that were originally planned. The probability of accidents and breakdowns of household appliances is increasing. Do not exclude injuries. It is better to refrain from participation in sports competitions and intensive physical activities. Be careful with fire and electricity. This is not the best time to participate in improvised friendly parties. You can quarrel with friends and like-minded people. Try to lead a calm and predictable lifestyle, do not do anything fundamentally new. In the middle of the month you may have complications with the maintenance of pets. Do not let the cat on the balcony - there is a risk that it will fall. When walking a dog, make sure that it does not run away. At the end of May your health improves, the energy of the body rises. It is good to undergo medical examinations and start a course of medical and preventive procedures. It is also a good time for career advancement.

Cancer.Characteristics: The most devoted sign, the family for them is the most precious thing they have in life. They are very touchy, although they can not show this, so as not to offend the partner, this generates their ability to rash generosity. They have developed intuition, which can greatly frighten them.
Cancer.Prediction: In the beginning and in the middle of May Cancers can be insufficiently active and initiative. In this case, it will be difficult for you to resist negative external influences. Therefore, if there is no possibility to influence the circumstances, then the best tactic for these days is to learn how to adapt, adapt to external circumstances. This will allow you to minimize possible troubles. Particularly problematic may be the relationship with a partner in marriage and business. You can realize that you and your partner have different strategic goals, and on this ground, differences can intensify. The middle of May is characterized by the activation of romantic and friendly relations. However, there may be a problem when you have to choose at some point with whom to spend time: with friends or with your loved one. At the end of the month, a great time for love and creativity. Perhaps you will be carried away by some interesting activity. Good trips to the sea, the probability of a holiday romance is high.

Leo.Characteristics: They have great leadership abilities, which is why in their sweet head, perhaps, a plan is being created to seize the world, and others do not know about it. Lions will be unhappy if they know that they are not loved and respected, but these people never take offense for a long time. This is the noblest sign, therefore their motivations are always only for the sake of good purposes.
Leo.Prediction: The beginning and middle of May for Lviv can be unfavorable for maintaining health. The likelihood of psychosomatic disorders increases due to anxiety and stress. Strive to make your daily life calm and predictable. To do this, you should lead a measured way of life and do nothing fundamentally new. The state of health can be violated because of violation of the regime days. Try to stick to a stable regime, wake up and go to bed at the same time. In the middle of May, you may have a lot of worries and hassles in your family, and you may need to ask to get out of work early. However, the authorities may be dissatisfied. This is not the best time for a career. At the end of the month, your family has an ideal time of complete harmony and tranquility. Try to spend more time at home - thanks to a harmonious psychological atmosphere, you will feel good in the family. It's also a good time to work on the garden plot.

Virgo.Characteristics: They think that if you do something, it's better not to do it at all. They have an analytical mindset, which is why when they hear from a friend that they have a problem, they will make up a whole chain of things coming out of this situation. Virgo aspire to the ideal, for this reason a couple choose only that one.
Virgo.Prediction: Lovers of Virgo in the beginning and middle of May can survive a lot of unrest. Relations with a loved one can not endure better times. You may feel that you are becoming colder, that you lack love and care, and that a loved one does not give you tenderness and affection. To some extent this may correspond to reality, however, the stars do not advise you to unnecessarily dramatize the situation. Love has its own periods of ups and downs and one must believe that there will be an upsurge in the recession. It is also a difficult period for those who are exposed to gambling. The fact is that these days it will be difficult for you to keep yourself from gambling, which can have a very negative impact on the state of your budget. In the middle of the month, things may become more complicated with students' studies. There is a risk of delaying the training program. It is better to refrain from traveling these days. At the end of May there is a favorable time for contacts and partnership. You can completely remove all the contradictions in the relationship with the partner due to the fact that you will be able to calm and benevolent constructive dialogue.

Libra.Characteristics: These people are close to art and can see beauty, this skill and controls the life of Libra. People love them, and all because they can arrange for themselves, with each acting the way the latter wants. A large proportion of Libra have a business vein
Libra.Prediction: Libra in the beginning and middle of May, may have to flexibly maneuver in family and partnership relations. The fact is that in your family conflict may arise. This is especially true for those partners who live together with relatives in one living space. In this case, a complex generation conflict is not ruled out. The stars advise you to occupy a peacekeeping position, although it will not always be possible to show your diplomatic talents. It is extremely undesirable these days to invite guests to your home from among relatives - this can aggravate the situation. In the middle of the month is not the best time to apply for a loan. At the end of the month your financial affairs will go uphill. Increase income, improve overall health. A good time to buy a pet.

Scorpio.Characteristics: Cruel and hot nature, so they are called the strongest signs. The desire for success is laid in their blood, but they achieve it in some mysterious ways, so the surrounding people do not quite understand how he did it. Scorpions were born to be a  big bump
Scorpio.Prediction: The stars advise the Scorpions in the beginning and middle of May to pay maximum attention to their health. During this period, there may be an energy decline in the body, which can provoke the development of acute viral infections with an increase in temperature. Especially vulnerable are the lungs and the respiratory tract. It is very important to dress in the weather, do not get under drafts and under cold pouring rain. Another problem topic can be the relationship with people from the usual circle of communication. There may be quarrels with neighbors, acquaintances or relatives. The less you communicate with someone, the less likely it is for conflict. In the middle of May, try to be softer and more tolerant with a partner in marriage. At the end of May, there is a great time for your personal development and creativity. You can take something seriously seriously. However, the most likely your hobby may be falling in love. Romantic relationships can survive the period of the highest flowering.

Sagittarius.Characteristics: Their directness sometimes becomes too harsh, but people like it for it. They hate being in four walls, so they go to distant countries or to the world of books.
Sagittarius.Prediction: Typical Streltsov in the beginning and middle of May there may be situations that lead to a sharp increase in financial expenses. For the most part, these can be unproductive expenses, related both to losses, losses, and not to the acquisition of material values. The probability of spending on rest, love and entertainment increases. If you are in love, then an important item of expenditure can be buying gifts, surprises and paying for visits to restaurants, bars, concerts. It can also be the purchase of goods for children. In this regard, your main task may be to preserve the material resources that you had before. In mid-May, your well-being may worsen - a general decline in energy may not be ruled out. At the end of the month, it's time for harmony in the family and for your inner development. It will be beneficial to stay in solitude, accompanied by spiritual practices, meditation. A good time for additional work, remote work, freelancing.

Capricorn.Characteristics: People convict him of being dry, but he just can not express his deep feelings, so he does it through actions. The work is extremely concentrated, and therefore successful. The simplest sign of the Zodiac, requiring understanding and support.
Capricorn.Prediction: Capricorns in the beginning and middle of May can be directed to the implementation of their initiatives. Your active position can be aimed at strengthening the influence and control over your family, close relatives. However, you will tend not to reckon with other opinions, doing only what you want. And this can lead to a clash of interests and opinions. Stars advise you to moderate activity and not to hurry to implement your personal plans in life, if you have to touch on other people's interests. Otherwise, you can get bogged down in conflicts instead of creative activity. In the middle of the month, someone or something can interfere with your creativity. The desire to gain personal freedom can run into obligations to friends. At the end of May, a good time to expand the circle of communication, travel, study. You can successfully solve your problems by attracting other people.

Aquarius.Characteristics: They are brilliant. They know how to make it so that everyone likes, sometimes in harm to themselves, but their incompetence among people is embodied in science and creativity.
Aquarius.Prediction: Aquarius in the beginning and middle of May may have a period associated with instability in contacts. It is not recommended to rely on the fulfillment of the promises given to you. The situation can change rapidly and if you do not get something from a person right away, then after a while this person may get lost from the field of your vision. Extremely reckless can become an acquaintance with fellow travelers while traveling. Confidential conversation with such a casual acquaintance can turn into trouble for you. Do not trust anyone with secrets from your personal life. In the middle of the month, there can be a lot of work in the family and in the household. At the end of May, there is a beautiful period for improving social and professional status. You can be offered a prestigious position or financially reward you. Dating with influential people will promote career growth.

Pisces.Characteristics: Other people may seem duplicitous, but these are the costs of their duality: they can be great figures and dreamy romantics. All their lives are in search of beauty and harmony, but they are not always found, because they do not know what they need. They do not like changes, the old and proven for them more closely.
Pisces.Prediction: At typical Pisces in the beginning and middle of May the probability of losses and material losses increases. You may encounter a breakdown of household appliances or a car, which will require urgent financial injections, either for repairs, or for the purchase of new equipment. Another potentially problematic topic may be related to your desire for an idle pastime, spending money on entertainment and entertainment with friends and girlfriends. Anyway, but in your budget there can be a hole, which is to be patched afterwards. At the end of the month, in the last decade, there is a favorable time for personal development and increased self-esteem. Perhaps there will be some events that can serve as a basis for increasing self-esteem and strengthening your reputation. For example, you can take a prize in a creative contest.
